message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $150 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying.  I'd be willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  I'm still a bit higher than I want to go. How about $115?
I'm not quite willing to go as low as $115, Bob. But I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $125?
